planet.name: OGLE-2013-BLG-0723LB b
planet.description: OGLE-2013-BLG-0723LBb was announced as a Venus-mass planet orbiting a brown dwarf of 32 Jupiter masses, which is itself orbiting a low-mass star. It would therefore be considered either a scaled-up exommon system or a scaled-down planetary system. Han et al. (2016) showed that the light curve could be better modelled as a binary consisting of 0.2 and 0.1 solar mass stars without a planet.
